languages.text: "Обещаю, губернатор — я выжгу дотла ростки бунтарства и ереси на вашей планете".

traits.locale_text: "Обещаю, губернатор — я выжгу дотла ростки бунтарства и ереси на вашей планете".

languages.text: "I promise you, Governor, I will hunt down the seeds of rebellion and heresy on your planet and burn them to ash."
languages.original_text: "Обещаю, губернатор — я выжгу дотла ростки бунтарства и ереси на вашей планете".

traits.locale_text: "I promise you, Governor, I will hunt down the seeds of rebellion and heresy on your planet and burn them to ash."
"I promise you, Governor, I will hunt down the seeds of rebellion and heresy on your planet and burn them to ash."
"I promise you, Governor, I will hunt down the seeds of rebellion and heresy on your planet and burn them to ash."
"I promise you, Governor, I will hunt down the seeds of rebellion and heresy on your planet and burn them to ash."

languages.text: “我向你保证，总督。我会在你的行星上狩猎叛乱与异端的种子，把它们烧成灰烬。”
languages.original_text: "I promise you, Governor, I will hunt down the seeds of rebellion and heresy on your planet and burn them to ash."

traits.locale_text: “我向你保证，总督。我会在你的行星上狩猎叛乱与异端的种子，把它们烧成灰烬。”

languages.text: «Gobernadora, le prometo que encontraré el origen de la rebelión y la herejía en este planeta y lo reduciré a cenizas».
languages.original_text: "I promise you, Governor, I will hunt down the seeds of rebellion and heresy on your planet and burn them to ash."

traits.locale_text: «Gobernadora, le prometo que encontraré el origen de la rebelión y la herejía en este planeta y lo reduciré a cenizas».

languages.text: 「約束しよう、総督。この星にある反乱と異端の種を駆逐し、燃やして灰にしよう」
languages.original_text: "I promise you, Governor, I will hunt down the seeds of rebellion and heresy on your planet and burn them to ash."

traits.locale_text: 「約束しよう、総督。この星にある反乱と異端の種を駆逐し、燃やして灰にしよう」

languages.text: "Ich verspreche Euch, Gouverneurin, ich werde die Saat von Rebellion und Ketzerei auf Eurem Planeten aufspüren und zu Asche verbrennen."
languages.original_text: "I promise you, Governor, I will hunt down the seeds of rebellion and heresy on your planet and burn them to ash."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verspreche Euch, Gouverneurin, ich werde die Saat von Rebellion und Ketzerei auf Eurem Planeten aufspüren und zu Asche verbrennen."

languages.text: « Je trouverai où se terrent les germes de la rébellion et de l'hérésie sur votre planète et je les réduirai en cendres, vous avez ma parole. »
languages.original_text: "I promise you, Governor, I will hunt down the seeds of rebellion and heresy on your planet and burn them to ash."

traits.locale_text: « Je trouverai où se terrent les germes de la rébellion et de l'hérésie sur votre planète et je les réduirai en cendres, vous avez ma parole. »

languages.text: "Sana söz Vali, gezegenindeki isyan ve küfür tohumlarını avlayıp küle çevireceğim."
languages.original_text: "I promise you, Governor, I will hunt down the seeds of rebellion and heresy on your planet and burn them to ash."

traits.locale_text: "Söz veriyorum Valim, gezegenindeki isyan ve küfür tohumlarını avlayıp küle çevireceğim."
